languages.text: "Давно не виделись, Шпигель. Скажи, каков вкус у молчания?" {n}Используют тайный шифр? Без Огнеголосого он бы даже не стал со мной говорить.{/n}

traits.locale_text:
"Давно не виделись, Шпигель. Скажи мне, каков вкус у молчания?"
{n}Используют тайный шифр? Ясно. Без Инфернус-мастера он бы даже не стал со мной говорить.{/n}

languages.text: "Long time no see, Spindle. Tell me, what does silence taste like?" {n}Are they using a secret code? Without Flaming Voice, he would never even speak to me.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Давно не виделись, Шпигель. Скажи, каков вкус у молчания?" {n}Используют тайный шифр? Без Огнеголосого он бы даже не стал со мной говорить.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Long time no see, Spindle. Tell me, what does silence taste like?" {n}Are they using a secret code? Without Flaming Voice, he would never even speak to me.{/n}
"Long time no see, Spindle. Tell me, what does silence taste like?" {n}Are they using a secret code? Without the Flaming Heart, he would never even talk to me.{/n}

"Long time no see, Spindle. Tell me, what does silence taste like?" {n}Are they using a secret code? Without Flaming Voice, he would never even speak to me.{/n}

languages.text: "Lange nicht gesehen, Spindel. Sagt, wie schmeckt Schweigen?" {n}Ist das ein geheimer Code? Ohne Flammende Stimme würde er niemals überhaupt auch nur mit mir sprechen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Long time no see, Spindle. Tell me, what does silence taste like?" {n}Are they using a secret code? Without Flaming Voice, he would never even speak to me.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Lange nicht gesehen, Spindel. Sagt, wie schmeckt Schweigen?" {n}Ist das ein geheimer Code? Ohne Flammenherz würde er niemals überhaupt auch nur mit mir sprechen.{/n}
"Lange nicht gesehen, Spindel. Sagt, wie schmeckt Schweigen?" {n}Ist das ein geheimer Code? Ohne Flammenherz würde er niemals überhaupt auch nur mit mir sprechen.{/n}

languages.text: «Cuánto tiempo, Huso. Dime, ¿a qué sabe el silencio?». {n}¿Están hablando en código? Sin Voz Llameante, ni siquiera me hablaría.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Long time no see, Spindle. Tell me, what does silence taste like?" {n}Are they using a secret code? Without Flaming Voice, he would never even speak to me.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Cuánto tiempo, Huso. Dime, ¿a qué sabe el silencio?». {n}¿Están hablando en código? Sin Voz Llameante, ni siquiera me hablaría.{/n}

languages.text: 「久しぶりだな、スピンドル。教えてくれ。沈黙はどんな味がする？」{n}秘密のコードでも使っているのか？燃える声がいなければ、彼は私に話しかけることすらしないだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Long time no see, Spindle. Tell me, what does silence taste like?" {n}Are they using a secret code? Without Flaming Voice, he would never even speak to me.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「久しぶりだな、スピンドル。教えてくれ。沈黙はどんな味がする？」{n}秘密のコードでも使っているのか？燃える声がいなければ、彼は私に話しかけることすらしないだろう。{/n}

languages.text: “好久不见了，‘转轴’。告诉我，沉默是什么滋味？”{n}这是他们之间的某种暗语吗？如果“烈焰之声”不在场的话，这个人甚至根本不会理会我。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Long time no see, Spindle. Tell me, what does silence taste like?" {n}Are they using a secret code? Without Flaming Voice, he would never even speak to me.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “好久不见了，‘转轴’。告诉我，沉默是什么滋味？”{n}这是他们之间的某种暗语吗？如果“烈焰之声”不在场的话，这个人甚至根本不会理会我。{/n}

languages.text: « Ça faisait longtemps, Broche. Dites-moi, quel goût a le silence ? » {n}Serait-ce un code secret ? Sans Timbre flamboyant, il ne m'aurait jamais adressé la parole.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Long time no see, Spindle. Tell me, what does silence taste like?" {n}Are they using a secret code? Without Flaming Voice, he would never even speak to me.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Ça faisait longtemps, Broche. Dites-moi, quel goût a le silence ? » {n}Serait-ce un code secret ? Sans Timbre flamboyant, il ne m'aurait jamais adressé la parole.{/n}

languages.text: "Görüşmeyeli uzun zaman oldu Spindle. Anlat bakalım, sessizliğin tadı nasıl?" {n}Gizli bir kod mu kullanıyor bunlar? Alazlı Ses olmadan benimle asla konuşmaz.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Long time no see, Spindle. Tell me, what does silence taste like?" {n}Are they using a secret code? Without Flaming Voice, he would never even speak to me.{/n}
